ri:Resource.title: ST-ECF Hubble Space Telescope Spectra

content.subject: NOT PROVIDED
content.description:
1D Spectra (science frames only) from the classical HST archive hosted at ST-ECF/ESO. The frames are calibrated and stored in the HST Cache for immediate access.
The ST-ECF HST archive interface can be accessed at http://archive.eso.org/hst/science
